sentence.Network_cn: 他回答的时候漫不经心，没当回事。

sentence.Network_en: He answered the reporters'questions flippantly; this cannot be airily explained to your children.
sentence.Network_cn: 他轻率地回答了记者的问题; 这个不能随便说给孩子听.

sentence.Network_en: How can you treat me so flippantly!
sentence.Network_cn: 你怎么能对我这样轻薄!

PerfectNetExp.abs: flippant 轻率的flippantly 轻率地flipper 鳍状肢
flippantly的意思、解释 adv.  1. 轻率地,没礼貌地flippantly的用法例句 1. How can you treat me so flippantly! 你怎么能对我这样轻薄! 2. He answered.

entry.tran: 轻率的;轻浮的;不严肃的
entry.def: If you describe a person or what they say as flippant, you are criticizing them because you think they are not taking something as seriously as they should.

example.ex: Don't be flippant, damn it! This is serious!...
example.tran: 该死，不要不当回事！这是很严肃的！

example.ex: He now dismisses that as a flippant comment.
example.tran: 他现在把那当作轻率的随口一说不再理会了。

sentences.sentence: "this cannot be airily explained to your children"

auth_sentence.content: There is something in the air causing women to feel the need to dress more seriously, more soberly, less flippantly.
auth_sentence.res_content: There is something in the air causing women to feel the need to dress more seriously, more soberly, less flippantly.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: There is something in the air causing women to feel the need to dress more seriously, more soberly, less flippantly.

auth_sentence.content: "He hung out with the people that flippantly just used the n-word, " Jordan said.

auth_sentence.res_content_con: "He hung out with the people that flippantly just used the n-word, " Jordan said.

auth_sentence.content: "They have been threatening to annihilate us for the last several months, " she said, almost flippantly.
auth_sentence.res_content: "They have been threatening to annihilate us for the last several months, " she said, almost flippantly.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: "They have been threatening to annihilate us for the last several months, " she said, almost flippantly.
